name: ZarrishPatient
title: Zarish Sphere Patient Profile
description: Patient profile for Zarish Sphere SSOT platform with multi-country identifier support - FHIR R5
purpose: To standardize patient demographic and administrative information across Zarish Sphere deployments in Bangladesh, India, Myanmar, Pakistan, and Thailand

element.definition: Patient demographic and clinical information within Zarish Sphere SSOT
Patient unique identifiers: medical record number, national ID, passport number, biometric ID
The namespace for the identifier (e.g., http://example.com/patient-id)
The identifier value assigned by the issuing system
Whether this patient record is in active use (true) or archived (false)
Patient name in local or Latin script; may include given, family, and middle names
Contact details: phone numbers, email addresses
Patient biological sex: male, female, other, unknown
Date of birth (required for age-based clinical protocols and eligibility)
Residential address: street, city, district, province, country, postal code
Marital status relevant for social and reproductive health programs
Emergency contact or next of kin with relationship and contact details
